text: The taxes imposed by §§ 47-1806.01 to 47-1806.06 upon residents shall apply to the income of resident estates, and income from any kind of property held in resident trusts, including:
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-1809.3.

1973 Ed., § 47-1577b.

DC CODE § 47-1809.03

Current through December 11, 2012
credits: (July 16, 1947, 61 Stat. 347, ch. 258, art. I, title IX, § 3; enacted, Apr. 9, 1997, D.C. Law 11-254, § 2, 44 DCR 1575.)

sections.text: Income accumulated in trust for the benefit of unborn or unascertained person or persons with contingent interests, and income accumulated or held for future distribution under the terms of the will or trust;

Income which is to be distributed currently by the fiduciary to the beneficiaries, and income collected by a guardian of any infant or incompetent person which is to be held or distributed as the court may direct;
Income received by estates of deceased persons during the period of administration or settlement of the estate; and
Income which, in the discretion of the fiduciary, may be either distributed to the beneficiaries or accumulated.

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Tax on Estates and Trusts. (Refs & Annos)
